body:

But today I come from school and go in LOL,and I have 150 rp....i didnt buy something ever,or give someone my password....What should i do? I repeat,I now name of guy who send me a link. P
lease help

replies.body: Submit a ticket to Riot saying that there were unauthorized charges to your account. Make sure to change your password too.

Ronomonium is right here.

If you think your account was compromised, please write in to Player Support as soon as possible with as much information as you can.  If anything was lost while it was compromised, they'll do their best to restore it.  Be patient though, the process can take some time to verify all of the information.
